ISSUE.TITLE: Detect when AdBlock running and ask the user to disable it
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: AdBlock has false alarms on some of the AJAX calls re:dash makes (for example when a dashboard slug begins with "advertising-"). We need to detect if AdBlock runs and show a warning to the user.

COMMIT.MESSAGE: give warning/error msg on inaccurate graph config #57 I tried to make `JSON.stringify(this.visualization.options.columnMapping)` a variable to avoid repeating it, but if I make it a `let` the linter throws an error and if I make it a `const` then it doesn’t change with the UI and the logic doesn’t work. :(
